titles.title: A bill to extend the suspension of duty on certain narrow fabric weaving machines.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S10854)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 8/6/1993--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend, through December 31, 1998, the suspension of duty on power-driven weaving machines for weaving fabrics not exceeding 30 cm in width.
